summary: THE VEHICLE WANDERED WHILE DRIVING.  THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO THE DEALER WHO STATED THAT THE BOLTS WHERE LOOSE ON THE FRONT END.  *NLM    THE VEHICLE WANDERED WHILE DRIVING.  THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO THE DEALER WHO STATED THAT THE BOLTS WHERE LOOSE ON THE FRONT END.  CONSUMER WENT TO CAPITOL CADILLAC WITH A NOISE AND STEERING PROBLEM.  THEY FOUND A LOOSE BOLT, AND TIGHTENED IT.  SAIT IT WAS OUT OF LINE AS A RESULT.  *MR
